title: Region defined by radical function, vert. lines part - b

content.question: Find the value of h such that the vertical line x = h divides the region R into two regions of equal area

frqParts.text: Find the value of h such that the vertical line x = h divides the region R into two regions of equal area

topic.text: 8.4: Finding the Area Between Curves Expressed as Functions of x

skill.text: Skill 1.E: Apply appropriate mathematical rules or procedures, with and without technology.
